hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
svn_user=`ruby /usr/share/tomcat6/scripts/aws/showback_domain.rb properties google_svn_user` svn_password=`ruby /usr/share/tomcat6/scripts/aws/showback_domain.rb properties google_svn_pass`
svn upgrade
rm -rf /tags/$TAG
svn copy trunk/src tags/$TAG
sed -i 's@<remote>.*</remote>@<remote>https://subversion.assembla.com/svn/manatees/tags/$TAG/src/gems/common-step-definitions</remote>@' tags/$TAG/jenkins_config/jobs/CreateCommonStepDefinitionsGem/config.xml sed -i 's@<remote>.*</remote>@<remote>https://subversion.assembla.com/svn/manatees/tags/$TAG/src/infrastructure/manatees</remote>@' tags/$TAG/jenkins_config/jobs/CreateTargetEnvironment/config.xml sed -i 's@<remote>.*</remote>@<remote>https://subversion.assembla.com/svn/manatees/tags/$TAG/src/deployment</remote>@' tags/$TAG/jenkins_config/jobs/DeployManateeApplication/config.xml sed -i 's@<remote>.*</remote>@<remote>https://subversion.assembla.com/svn/manatees/tags/$TAG/src/config</remote>@' tags/$TAG/jenkins_config/jobs/UploadConfigFilesToS3/config.xml
svn commit -m "test" --username $svn_user --password $svn_password --non-interactive
